pli-tv-bu-vb-sk60:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk60:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhū āvudhapāṇissa dhammaṃ desenti …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk60:1.3: “Na āvudhapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk60:1.7: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca āvudhapāṇissa agilānassa dhammaṃ deseti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
